mapper.select: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS service ( service_id varchar(255) NOT NULL, service_group varchar(255) NOT NULL, service_name varchar(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, alarm_way varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, wechat_app_name varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, description varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, update_time datetime(0) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (service_id) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS service_url ( url_id varchar(255) NOT NULL, service_id varchar(255) NOT NULL, url_content varchar(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE, request_type varchar(50) NOT NULL, param_content varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, body_content text DEFAULT NULL, description varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, update_time datetime(0) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (url_id) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS rule ( rule_id varchar(255) NOT NULL, url_id varchar(255) NOT NULL, formula varchar(255) NOT NULL, rule_alias varchar(50) NOT NULL, description varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, update_time datetime(0) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (rule_id) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS monitor_data ( data_id varchar(255) NOT NULL, url_id varchar(255) NOT NULL, rule_id varchar(255) NOT NULL, data_content text NOT NULL, update_time datetime(0) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (data_id) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = InnoDB CHARACTER SET = utf8 COLLATE = utf8_general_ci ROW_FORMAT = Dynamic;
